mapper.select: select ID, GROUPID, MANUFACTORYID, MANUFACTORYNAME, PRODUCTNUM, PRODUCTMONEY, EXPRESSMONEY, TOTALMONEY, PAYMETHOD, EXPRESSID, EXPECTARRIVETIME, STATUS, PURCHASEOPER, STORAGEID, STORAGENAME, CONTENT, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, TRACEOPER, OPER, OPERTIME from DB_PURCHASE_ORDER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
